pageProduct.name: Oral B Toothpaste Pro Health Advanced Whitening 110g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Protect, strengthen and enhance your smile with Oral-B Pro Health Advanced pastes. Whether you're looking for a deeper clean, tooth whitening, better protection of enamel, or fresher breath, each Oral-B Pro Health Advanced paste is clinically proven to deliver stronger teeth and healthier gums starting from day 1.
Elevate your oral health with Oral-B Pro-Health toothpastes. Oral-B Pro-Health also fights tartar, cavities, harmful plaque, and bad breath while promoting gum health and preventing enamel erosion.
Formulated with Active Strength technology, Oral-B Pro-Health strengthens your teeth on the inside, whilst protecting them on the outside from acids in everyday foods.

General Information

Oral- B Pro-Health Advanced Toothpaste Whitening Mint for healthy gums and strong teeth.
Strengthens inside protects outside*
(*Strengthens enamel and protects the outside from acids in everyday food)

Oral-B® Pro-Health Advanced whitening toothpaste helps reveal your natural white smile.
With Oral-B Pro-Health's highest level of whitening ingredients for a natural white smile. 
With extra whitening power.
Strengthens inside, protects outside*
*Strengthens enamel and protects the outside from acids in everyday food.

Size: 110.0g

KEY FEATURES

• WITH REGULAR BRUSHING, ORAL-B® PRO-HEALTH® ADVANCED WHITENING HELPS:
Promote Gum Health
• Fight Harmful Plaque
• Whiten Teeth by Removing Surface Stains
• Prevent Enamel Erosion
• Fight Cavities
• Fight Tartar
• Fight Bad Breath

Warnings

Do not swallow. Not to be used by children under 12 years of age. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources consult a dentist or doctor. Contains Sodium Fluoride

CAUTION

Do not swallow. Not to be used by children under 12 years of age. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources consult a dentist or doctor.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

This tube has been foil sealed for your protection. Do not use if seal in tube is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Hexametaphosphate, PEG-6, Propylene Glycol, Water, Zinc Lactate, Flavour, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Carrageenan, Sodium Saccharin, Trisodium Phosphate, Stannous Fluoride, Stannous Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Fluoride, CI 77891, CI 74260, CI 74160.

Contains: Sodium Fluoride

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
